alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Dutchess; Greene; Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 8:05PM EDT until July 13 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Ulster County in east central New York... Northwestern Dutchess County in east central New York... West central Columbia County in east central New York... Southeastern Greene County in east central New York... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 805 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near North-South Lake Campground, or near Catskill, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Catskill, Saugerties, Woodstock, Red Hook, Lake Katrine, West Hurley, Saugerties South, North-South Lake Campground, Veteran, Germantown, Tivoli, Centerville, Quarryville, Manorville, Katsbaan, Shultis Corners, Sweet Meadows, Linden Acres, Round Top and Kiskatom. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
